alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 3:31AM EST until March 03 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe, Alleghany NC and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Grayson County. In West Virginia, Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher elevation locations will experience slightly higher gusts.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
